title: Connecting Your CRM with the Power of Telecom Using APIs

excerpt: Understand why loosely coupled architecture matters in modern contact centers and how MYLINEHUB controls multiple Asterisk servers without tight dependency or performance bottlenecks.

title: What Is Omnichannel CRM? Meaning, Benefits & How It Works
excerpt: Omnichannel CRM connects calls, WhatsApp, email, and support workflows into one customer timeline—so teams respond faster, automate follow-ups, and report accurately.

title: Omnichannel vs Multichannel: What’s the Difference and Which One Do You Need?
excerpt: Multichannel means you operate on many channels. Omnichannel means all channels share the same customer context. Learn the differences, examples, and the right choice for your business size.

title: What Is CPaaS? Meaning, Examples, Pros and Limitations
excerpt: CPaaS (Communications Platform as a Service) provides cloud APIs for voice and messaging. Learn what it is, where it fits, and where CPaaS-only setups hit limits for contact centers.
